data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Rapla to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rapla, Estonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 14,187 people in the state of Rapla who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Rapla, Estonia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Rapla, Estonia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 33,200 souls in Rapla and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,557 believers in the state of Rapla the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Rapla.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Rapla.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Rapla, Estonia has a population of 33,200.

We estimate Rapla has 1,557 people who might know Jesus, 14,187 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,455 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
